name: Hyrule Rebalance v7
desc: A more-or-less thorough rebalance of the game's components and features, making features less abusable and promoting previously undependable options.

multi.name: MAIN
multi.desc: Contains everything not listed in other modules - armour, enemies, materials, weapons, upgrades, mobility, drops, ecosystems, wildlife...

multi.name: Beedle
multi.desc: Turns Beedle into a weapon vendor. His inventory changes depending on the location.

multi.name: Dyes
multi.desc: Enables dyeing for every armour (except jewelry). Will not work with player model mods.

multi.name: Flurry Rush
multi.desc: Shorter duration, tighter window, no slowdown â€“ all to reduce dependability.

multi.name: Stamina
multi.desc: Adds a delay to stamina recovery to prevent abuse, adjusts stamina cost on most actions.

multi.name: Climate
multi.desc: Replaces cold/heat damage with a stamina penalty. Adjusted area and time-of-day temperatures.
